name: HyperDisplay_4DLCD-320240
description: Control SparkFun 2.4" TFT products using HyperDisplay. This library is a hardware specific HyperDisplay layer that provides out-of-the-box support for 2.4" TFT products from SparkFun.
keywords: display, graphics, hyperdisplay, sparkfun, tft, lcd, 320x240
